about_the_game:
Introducing the Last Boss Pack Vol. 2 by Gee Kun Soft, containing 10 fearsome boss-worthy characters and backgrounds for creators looking to bring their next foe to life in their latest creation.

The Last Boss Pack Vol. 2 contains 10 backgrounds and characters, along with a variant per character, and a bonus pack that includes the combination of each character in a designated background. Characters include Fallen Angel, Golem, Satan, Vampire and more. Could these be the foes that will challenge your heroes in your next RPG?

Features:

・10 battlers with "metallic /cyberpunk" version variants: 20 battlers total/comes in two sizes
・These 20 battlers comes with the matching walking sprites
・10 Battle Backgrounds in two sizes: 816x624 / 1000x740

Bonus!

・Battler & Background combined graphics x 20 sheets!
・6 extra walking sprites!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
